body: Newer members may not know me but most should. For those who don't know I am a former Senior Moderator, Map Developer, and Official and I retired from my positions in late 2016 / early 2017 after 2 years of service. Feel free to ask me anything but if you ask me for opinions on you, I won't be responding because those are boring.
